snippet: A secret agreement shows that in exchange for $43 million, the Federal Reserve Bank of New York agreed to testify on Bank of America’s behalf in a battle over fraud claims.
abstract: Gretchen Morgenson Fair Game column on secret agreement struck in July 2012 by Federal Reserve Bank of New York and Bank of America, which shows that in exchange for $43 million, NY Fed agreed to testify on Bank of America’s behalf in battle with American International Group over fraud claims on mortgage securities.
lead_paragraph: A secret agreement shows that in exchange for $43 million, the Federal Reserve Bank of New York agreed to testify on Bank of America’s behalf in a battle over fraud claims.

headline.seo: New York Fed Agreed to Testify for Bank of America
headline.main: Promises, Promises at the New York Fed
headline.print_headline: Promises, Promises at the New York Fed
